languages.text: Близок запуск титанической машины святого Когнация, тысячелетия лежавшей под монастырем. Пробуждение реликвии потребует ресурсов, но принесет славу.

After millennia of lying under the monastery, Saint Cognatius's titanic machine will soon be launched. It will take resources to awaken the relic, but doing so will bring glory to the von Valancius name.
languages.original_text: Близок запуск титанической машины святого Когнация, тысячелетия лежавшей под монастырем. Пробуждение реликвии потребует ресурсов, но принесет славу.

traits.locale_text: After millennia of lying under the monastery, the launch of Saint Cognatius's titanic machine nears. It will take resources to awaken the relic, but doing so will bring glory to the von Valancius name.
After a millennia lying under the monastery, the launch of Saint Cognatius's titanic machine nears.

After millennia of lying under the monastery, Saint Cognatius's titanic machine will soon be launched. It will take resources to awaken the relic, but doing so will bring glory to the von Valancius name.
After millennia of lying under the monastery, the launch of Saint Cognatius's titanic machine nears.

After millennia of lying under the monastery, the launch of Saint Cognatius's titanic machine nears. It will take resources to awaken the relic, but doing so will bring glory to the von Valancius name.

After millennia of lying under the monastery, Saint Cognatius's titanic machine will soon be launched. It will take resources to awaken the relic, but doing so will bring glory to the von Valancius name.

After millennia of lying under the monastery, Saint Cognatius's titanic machine will soon be launched. It will take resources to awaken the relic, but doing so will bring glory to the von Valancius name.

languages.text: Après avoir passé des millénaires sous le monastère, la machine titanesque de Saint Cognatius s'apprête à être lancée. Éveiller la relique nécessitera une quantité non négligeable de ressources, mais couvrira également la maison von Valancius de gloire.
languages.original_text: After millennia of lying under the monastery, Saint Cognatius's titanic machine will soon be launched. It will take resources to awaken the relic, but doing so will bring glory to the von Valancius name.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir passé des millénaires sous le monastère, la machine titanesque de Saint Cognatius s'apprête à être lancée. Éveiller la relique nécessitera une quantité non négligeable de ressources, mais couvrira également la maison von Valancius de gloire.

languages.text: 何千年もの間、修道院の地下に眠っていた聖コグナティウスの巨人が、間もなく目を覚ますだろう。聖遺物を目覚めさせるには資源が必要だが、フォン・ヴァランシウスの名に栄光がもたらされることになる。
languages.original_text: After millennia of lying under the monastery, Saint Cognatius's titanic machine will soon be launched. It will take resources to awaken the relic, but doing so will bring glory to the von Valancius name.

traits.locale_text: 何千年もの間、修道院の地下に眠っていた聖コグナティウスの巨人が、間もなく目を覚ますだろう。聖遺物を目覚めさせるには資源が必要だが、フォン・ヴァランシウスの名に栄光がもたらされることになる。

languages.text: 在修道院的地底沉眠数千年后，圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的巨型机器即将再次启动。尽管唤醒这件圣物需要耗费大量资源，但也会为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝带来荣耀。
languages.original_text: After millennia of lying under the monastery, Saint Cognatius's titanic machine will soon be launched. It will take resources to awaken the relic, but doing so will bring glory to the von Valancius name.

traits.locale_text: 在修道院的地底沉眠数千年后，圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的巨型机器即将再次启动。尽管唤醒这件圣物需要耗费大量资源，但也会为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝带来荣耀。

languages.text: Tras pasar milenios bajo el monasterio, la colosal máquina de san Cognatius por fin será activada. Harán falta recursos para despertar la reliquia, pero hacerlo traerá gloria al nombre de von Valancius.
languages.original_text: After millennia of lying under the monastery, Saint Cognatius's titanic machine will soon be launched. It will take resources to awaken the relic, but doing so will bring glory to the von Valancius name.

traits.locale_text: Tras pasar milenios bajo el monasterio, la colosal máquina de san Cognatius por fin será activada. Harán falta recursos para despertar la reliquia, pero hacerlo traerá gloria al nombre de von Valancius.

languages.text: Nachdem sie jahrtausendelang unter dem Kloster schlummerte, naht nun der Start der titanischen Maschine des Heiligen Cognatius. Es werden Ressourcen nötig sein, um das Relikt zu erwecken, doch es wird dem Namen von Valancius auch viel Ehre einbringen.
languages.original_text: After millennia of lying under the monastery, Saint Cognatius's titanic machine will soon be launched. It will take resources to awaken the relic, but doing so will bring glory to the von Valancius name.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem sie jahrtausendelang unter dem Kloster schlummerte, naht nun der Start der titanischen Maschine des Heiligen Cognatius. Es werden Ressourcen nötig sein, um das Relikt zu erwecken, doch es wird dem Namen von Valancius auch viel Ehre einbringen.

languages.text: Binlerce yıl boyu manastırın altında yatmakta olan Aziz Cognatius'un devasa makinesi, yakında çalıştırılacak. Yadigârın diriltilebilmesi için birtakım kaynaklar gerekse de bu iş, von Valancius adının şanına şan katacak.
languages.original_text: After millennia of lying under the monastery, Saint Cognatius's titanic machine will soon be launched. It will take resources to awaken the relic, but doing so will bring glory to the von Valancius name.
